sentences.en: Can the New Zealand bowlers fight back after their thrashing at Christchurch?
sentences.cn: 在克赖斯特彻奇遭遇惨败后，新西兰的投球手们还有还手之力吗？

sentences.en: Christchurch is a city of eastern South Island, New Zealand, near the Pacific coast.
sentences.cn: 克赖斯特彻奇是新西兰南岛东部一城市, 靠近太平洋.

sentences.en: Christchurch Mayor Bob Parker is urging residents to stay indoors.
sentences.cn: 市长鲍勃·帕克敦促居民们尽量待在室内.

sentences.en: I competed in the Commonwealth Games in Christchurch, which was my swan song.
sentences.cn: 我参加了在克赖斯特彻奇举办的英联邦运动会，那是我的告别比赛。

sentences.en: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Christchurch on NZ ( E - Ticket ).
sentences.cn: 纽西兰航空公司来回香港至基督城经济客位机票(电子机票 ).

sentences.en: Take in the breathtaking scenery around Queenstown before flying home from Christchurch.
sentences.cn: 享受了昆斯敦市的绝佳美景后再由基督城乘飞机回家.

sentences.en: The pilot decided that Christchurch was too far away, and played it safe and landed at Wellington.
sentences.cn: 飞行员认为克赖斯特彻奇距离太远，为求稳妥，就降落在了惠灵顿。

sentences.en: The United States stands ready to provide assistance to the government of New Zealand and to the brave people of Christchurch.
sentences.cn: 克林顿说：“美国随时准备向新西兰政府和克赖斯特彻奇勇敢的人民提供援助。

sentences.en: To find out, make Christchurch your next vacation destination.
sentences.cn: 找找看, 明年的暑假新西兰基督城是你旅游的目标.

trans.tran_cn: 克莱斯特彻奇（或译基督堂市）（新西兰城市）
克莱斯特彻奇（新西兰南岛东岸港口城市）
